objective: Our team's objective is to transform open spatial data into actionable decisions through interactive visualizations, adjustable simulations, and micro-lessons that translate theory into practice.

challenge.title: The Challenge
challenge.subtitle: Meteor Madness
challenge.description: To build an application that converts open data on meteors and NEOs (Near-Earth Objects) into actionable decisions. This involves visualizing trajectories and events, estimating energy/impact, and simulating 'what-if' scenarios. The application must communicate risk clearly and educationally, featuring near real-time interaction.

impact.title: Impact / Purpose
items: Raise awareness about Near-Earth Objects (NEOs) and planetary defense
Inspire the next generation through science and technology
Transform NASA data into clear, actionable insights for everyone
